official_title: To establish a commission to study how Federal laws and policies affect United States citizens living in foreign countries.
short_title: Commission on Americans Living Abroad Act of 2017

summary.text:
Commission on Americans Living Abroad Act of 2017

This bill establishes the Commission on Americans Living Abroad which shall conduct a study of how federal laws and policies affect U.S. citizens living abroad, including civilians and members of the Armed Forces.

 Each federal agency affected by a recommendation in the report required by this bill shall submit a response to the President, Congress, and the Commission.

titles.title: To establish a commission to study how Federal laws and policies affect United States citizens living in foreign countries.
